title: kaury1
author: kaury1
content: When creating a market on OpenBook(https://serum-explorer.vercel.app/market/create?programID=srmqPvymJeFKQ4zGQed1GFppgkRHL9kaELCbyksJtPX)I change the Advanced Options to minimum (128/9/201) to reduce the cost of creation to ~ 0.3 Sol Next, three transactions are confirmed and the last one constantly gets an error: "Transaction failed to create market". As a result I cannot create a market at all and get Market IDPlease help to understand, maybe someone has already encountered the same error and problem.

comments.author: dbshck
comments.body: According to the FAQ in the OpenBook Discord, the tool you mentioned is no longer recommended and is known to cause random issue. They suggest using a different tool instead https://raydium.io/create-market/In case you come across any more issues, I suggest considering posting your question in the OpenBook Discord. You are more likely to receive prompt answers there as Bitcointalk may not have a large Solana community presence.

comments.author: darkeagle1236
comments.body: That site is deprecated. Use this site instead: https://gud.dev. It only costs 0.35 sol with minimal size while creating openbook market idhttps://ibb.co/f8m0ZV9
